name: Mine Passengers: The Air Craft Flying Game
name_original: Mine Passengers: The Air Craft Flying Game
description:
◉◉ Mine Passengers ◉◉

◉◉ Free Blocky Air Craft Flying Engine ◉◉

Dive into our new cube commercial aircrafts game!

If you've always wanted to fly a plane and bring your passengers safely to their destination this is your game!

To be a true leader in Mine Passengers you must be bold, fast, agile and safe!

You are in danger! The flight has begun and more and more planes are appearing in your way!

Your mission will be to dodge them without fail to not get your passengers damaged!

Choose the commercial blocky airplane that best suits your tastes and begin to show who is boss in the air!

This is a survival game that ends when you hit against another plane, but if you accumulate achievements you will be able to continue in the air and beat your high scores!

The more your pilot skills and driving passengers skills grow, the more your earnings grow which allows you to unlock new cube air planes!

Tell your friends all about it! Compete and try to lead the leaderboard!

Features of this cube commercial aircraft game:

◉ Intuitive controls by moving the device!
◉ Impressive speed!
◉ Leaderboards!
◉ Shocks and explosions!
◉ Amazing 3D graphics!
◉ Creative and addictive music!
◉ Free!

Immerse yourself between worldwide players of this commercial aircraft game to show who is the most effective and safe pilot in the air!

Improve your airplane handling and skills to unlock new challenges that the blocky aircrafts propose you.

Do you dare going at extreme speed without blinking while dodging all obstacles?

Download and value ​​this App now so that we can continue to improve it and that your favorite passenger planes stay reliable in the air!

Follow us on Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
